item.description:
“In the name of mixing up trivia destinations and having a decent pint of beer......our next stop is Trinity Brewhouse”

Everyone knows Trinity. Its that really famous brewhouse/pub Downtown. They also have a great trivia night, which will be our stop next Tuesday.

Trivia takes place in the lower level.

Come on down as we make another showing.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Every little bit helps and great conversation is guaranteed.

Game starts close to 8:00 and runs for about 2 hours!

Try to get there a little early - about 7:30 - as the place is small and fills up really fast.

See you there.

**** Any winnings will be applied to a future event.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me with a meetup sign
item.name: Trivia @ Trinity Brewhouse
